issue.title: [Website] Add new committers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6505](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6505). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I'd like to add new committers on the committer list.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6505?focusedCommentId=16926436) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
+1, you can just submit a PR.
